properties.body:
{
    "rule_id": "$activity.definition_activity_02JXY2S4QYWIZ6tfLW5smeUKtOy9mHm3WEE.output.variable_workflow_02CI036PKZ9DV3rbNAs3xb1cihTJ5kqgxlk$",
    "name": "$activity.definition_activity_02JXY2S4QYWIZ6tfLW5smeUKtOy9mHm3WEE.output.variable_workflow_02EVTZN0INLKY7NWn7eQ96rlugG02FmdqMh$",
    "title": "$activity.definition_activity_02JXY2S4QYWIZ6tfLW5smeUKtOy9mHm3WEE.output.variable_workflow_02EVTZN0INLKY7NWn7eQ96rlugG02FmdqMh$",
    "description": "Updated Rule with Old status",
    "type": "playbook_assignment.rule_event",
    "rule_type": "rule_event",
    "group_by": true,
    "stop_subsequent_rules": true,
    "base_type": "rule",
    "object_type": "ruleevent",
    "properties": {
        "conditions": {
            "operator": "and",
            "left_operand": {
                "left_operand": "$output.incident.status$",
                "operator": "eq",
                "right_operand": "New"
            },
            "right_operand": {
                "left_operand": "$output.incident.title$",
                "operator": "mw",
                "right_operand": "playbook-12041-old-status"
            }
        },
        "description": "Updated Rule with Old status",
        "disabled": false,
        "display_name": "$activity.definition_activity_02JXY2S4QYWIZ6tfLW5smeUKtOy9mHm3WEE.output.variable_workflow_02EVTZN0INLKY7NWn7eQ96rlugG02FmdqMh$",
        "group_by": true,
        "playbook_id": "$activity.definition_activity_02JXY1Z20BKPO6CKmOEVD2Rnn0yWjuGdDty.output.variable_workflow_02CHYY4GY92VF1xlgdyxXQ2kuqTnHhnMFyy$",
        "rule_type": "rule_event",
        "stop_subsequent_rules": true,
        "title": "$activity.definition_activity_02JXY2S4QYWIZ6tfLW5smeUKtOy9mHm3WEE.output.variable_workflow_02EVTZN0INLKY7NWn7eQ96rlugG02FmdqMh$",
        "type": "Playbook Assignment Rule",
        "workflows_config": [
            {
                "disabled": false,
                "ref_id": ""
            }
        ]
    },
    "version": "1.0.0",
    "disabled": false,
    "workflows_config": null
}

properties.script:
import random
import string

def get_random_string(length):
    # choose from all lowercase letter
    letters = string.ascii_lowercase
    result_str = ''.join(random.choice(letters) for i in range(length))
    print(result_str)

get_random_string(8)
